text: Ipso facto is a Latin phrase Ipso Facto may also refer to: ==Music== *Ipso Facto (English band) *Ipso Facto (American band) Wain McFarlane *Ipso Facto (Welsh band), later named Viva Machine ===Albums=== *Ipso Facto (album), album by Rik Emmett, 1992 *Ipso Facto, album by :fr:Bruno Grimaldi, 1992 ===Songs=== *"Ipso Facto", a song by the John Hall Band, 1983 ==Literature== *Iegor Gran#Bibliography
title: Ipso facto (disambiguation)
